title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2786/98 of 22 December 1998 concerning the modification of the period of authorisations of additives referred to in Article 9i(1) of Council Directive 70/524/EEC
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2786/98 of 22 December 1998 concerning the modification of the period of authorisations of additives referred to in Article 9i(1) of Council Directive 70/524/EEC
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Chapter III of Annex B to Directive 70/524/EEC is amended in accordance with the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 December 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
